wikipedia_page.main: Robert Adam Philips Haldane Haldane-Duncan, 3rd Earl of Camperdown (28 May 1841 – 5 June 1918), styled Viscount Duncan from 1859 to 1867, was a British Liberal politician.

link_mentions.page: Robert Adam Philips Haldane Haldane-Duncan, 3rd Earl of Camperdown

response: She exhibited at the Royal Academy in 1898. Her portrait on Benjamin Jowett was thought to very close to life and the letters from Jowett indicate a close friendship, although Jowett was a friend of her brother Robert Haldane-Duncan, 3rd Earl of Camperdown.Julia Abercromby, Balliol Archives, accessed 24 January 2013
